data.name: Devil's Island
data.detailed_description:
The eternal evil is hidden within the mountain. The last island not conquered by the empire needs a hero to save it from the coming evil ...
Play in a world full of dangerous creatures like lizards, animals, velociraptors, ogres and many more.
Play in the world of combat and magic in the atmosphere of medieval buildings, knights and bad characters like bandits, pirates and many more.
Dive, explore the world, gain experience, get new weapons and armor.
All of this in Devil's Island!

The most important features:

  • Third person character
  • A large variety of weapons and armor for your character
  • Lots of skills
  • Mana system for spells
  • Equipment
  • Stats and skills can influence max health, max stamina, max mana, damage, and weight carried
  • Experience and Levels
  • Clothing system
  • Talent system
data.about_the_game:

Play in a world full of dangerous creatures like lizards, animals, velociraptors, ogres and many more.

data.short_description: RPG game in a third-person mode in a fantasy atmosphere with an interesting storyline, in a world located on an island in the middle of the ocean, not yet conquered by the empire. Melee weapons, magic, archery and even fist fighting. You will meet knights, zombies, skeletons and even dinosaurs here.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit, Windows 8 64Bit, Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: IntelCore i5-4460 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 2GB DDR3
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit, Windows 8 64Bit, Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: IntelCore i5-4460 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB GDDR5
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
